bill_title: revise the General Appropriations Act for the Department of Veterans Affairs for 2014.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for the Department of Veterans Affairs for 2014. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That section 16 of chapter 25 of the 2013 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF VETERANS AFFAIRS (1) Veterans' Benefits and Services Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$337,326" and insert "$358,326" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 2. This Act is effective June 30, 2014. 170 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.098 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
